question: [File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/incentive_v2.move] [Function: base_claim_reward()] [Reward Calculation] Line 322 divides total_rewards_of_user by ray() to convert from RAY precision; could remainder be lost, accumulating as unclaimable dust over time? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/incentive_v2.move] [Function: base_claim_reward()] [Supply Cap Check] Lines 323-325 cap reward at (total_supply - distributed); but if multiple users claim concurrently, could they all pass this check before distributed is updated, causing over-distribution? (Critical)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/incentive_v2.move] [Function: base_claim_reward()] [Distributed Overflow] Line 329 adds reward to pool.distributed; could repeated claims cause distributed to exceed u64::MAX and wrap around? (High)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/incentive_v2.move] [Function: base_claim_reward()] [Event Emission] RewardsClaimed event at line 331-335 emitted inside loop; if loop processes 100 pools, could excessive events cause transaction to exceed size limits? (Low)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/incentive_v2.move] [Function: base_claim_reward()] [Amount Accumulation] Line 328 adds reward to amount_to_pay; could overflow occur if total rewards across all pools exceed u64::MAX? (High)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/incentive_v2.move] [Function: base_claim_reward()] [Balance Decrease] Line 341 calls decrease_balance with amount_to_pay; if IncentiveFundsPool balance < amount_to_pay due to concurrent withdrawals, does it revert or return partial amount? (Critical)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/incentive_v2.move] [Function: base_claim_reward()] [Zero Balance Return] Lines 343-344 return zero balance if amount_to_pay=0; could this be exploited to create many zero-value transfers for griefing? (Low)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/incentive_v2.move] [Function: base_claim_reward()] [Table State] Lines 317-320 remove and re-add total_claimed_of_users; if user never claimed before, could missing key cause unexpected behavior? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/incentive_v2.move] [Function: claim_reward_with_account_cap()] [Account Owner] Line 289 gets account_owner from AccountCap; if AccountCap is transferred to attacker, could they claim original owner's rewards? (High)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/incentive_v2.move] [Function: claim_reward_non_entry()] [Composability] Line 283-286 returns Balance<T> for composability; if caller mishandles this balance, could rewards be permanently locked? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/incentive_v2.move] [Function: get_pool_from_funds_pool()] [Address Comparison] Line 361 compares pool.funds with funds_pool address; could address collision between different IncentiveFundsPool objects cause wrong pool matching? (Low)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/incentive_v2.move] [Function: get_pool_from_funds_pool()] [Loop Performance] Lines 354-367 iterate through all pool_objs; if incentive has 10,000+ pools, could this cause timeout in claim_reward? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/incentive_v2.move] [Function: get_pool_from_funds_pool()] [Empty Result] If no pools match criteria, empty vector returned; does base_claim_reward handle empty vector correctly or could it cause unexpected behavior? (Low)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/incentive_v2.move] [Function: get_pool_from_asset_and_option()] [Triple Return] Lines 485-514 return three vectors but some pools appear in multiple; could caller mishandle overlapping pool addresses? (Low)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/incentive_v2.move] [Function: get_pool_from_asset_and_option()] [Early Continue] Lines 495-501 continue early for exact matches; could this skip pools that should be added to pools_by_asset or pools_by_option? (High)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/incentive_v2.move] [Function: get_active_pools()] [Time Boundary] Lines 529-530 check start_at <= now AND end_at >= now; could pool be missed if now exactly equals start_at or end_at due to boundary conditions? (Low)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/incentive_v2.move] [Function: get_active_pools()] [Inactive Pools] Only checks pool_objs not inactive_objs; could recently frozen but still active pools be excluded from results? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/incentive_v2.move] [Function: version_verification()] [Version Check] Line 117 calls pre_check_version but doesn't return result; could outdated version still execute sensitive functions? (High)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/incentive_v2.move] [Function: version_migrate()] [Migration Safety] Lines 120-123 update version but don't migrate any data structures; could old data format be incompatible with new version logic? (High)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/incentive_v2.move] [Function: version_migrate()] [Version Comparison] Line 121 requires incentive.version < this_version(); what if admin calls migrate multiple times, could version be artificially inflated? (Low)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/incentive_v2.move] [Function: create_incentive()] [Initial Version] Line 189 sets version to this_version(), but create_next_version_incentive_for_testing at line 877 sets version=0; could test version be deployed to production? (High)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/incentive_v2.move] [Function: get_pool_info()] [Data Exposure] Lines 564-596 return all pool fields including internal accounting data; could this leak sensitive information for MEV attacks? (Low)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/incentive_v2.move] [Function: get_total_claimed_from_user()] [Missing Entry] Lines 611-618 return 0 if user not in table; could this hide legitimate claims and confuse frontends? (Low)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/incentive_v2.move] [Function: calculate_one_from_pool()] [Public Calculation] Lines 606-609 expose calculate_one publicly; could attacker use this to predict exact reward amounts for front-running? (Low)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/incentive_v2.move] [Function: get_funds_value()] [Balance Exposure] Lines 602-604 return exact balance of funds pool; could attacker monitor this to time attacks when balance is low? (Low)
